category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 10 (Handling of urgent business)
contents: Article 10 (Processing of Urgent Affairs) If the chairperson determines that the content of a matter to be deliberated by the committee is minor or urgent, he or she may substitute a written resolution for the committee's resolution. However, when the majority of the members request to formally refer the matter to the committee, this must be followed. Revised 2018. 4. 25.
